Posts.Content: Hi Dear Sister in Cancer,   My email address is: --Message edited by CancerCompass staff. For personal protection, email address removed. Consider private reply. Please review CancerCompass Member Guidelines at http://www.cancercompass.com/common/guidelines.html--  I would love to talk to you as I have the same problem.  Write to me direct and we can talk.  If that is uncomfortable for you, then use this forum.  Hope today is a good one for you....  Anna
Posts.Title: FOR DIMPLEAPRIL
